original_title: New York Agora: The Legacy of the 60s Counterculture
overview: The film explores the memory and the legacy of the 60s counterculture through interviews with NY political activists, artists and people on the street. The mosaic of voices heard in the documentary creates a public site for memories, reflections and hopes for the future to be shared beyond the confines of one's community. An inter-generational exploration on what is left of the 60s in people's memory and consciousness.
title: New York Agora: The Legacy of the 60s Counterculture
